body.quiz:
Dorothea Lange took photos of people in the community to share information with the world. What type of photographer was she?

Image of: art supplies in containers
body.correct: Way to go! You know that Dorothea Lange was a photojournalist who took pictures of the people in her community.
body.failed: So close! Remember, Dorothea Lange was a photojournalist. She took photos of people in her community to share with the world.

options: Image of: a little girl playing with a ball
Image of: a hand holding a stopwatch
Image of: a baseball player about to hit the ball with his bat
body.quiz: Select the image that a sports photographer might take.
body.answer: Image of: a mother and son wearing matching jerseys eating popcorn and watching sports on TV
body.correct: Great work! You know a sports photographer takes pictures of athletes competing.
body.failed: You're almost there. Remember, a sports photographer takes photos of athletes competing.

body.quiz:
How can you prevent a photo from turning out blurry?

Image of:
body.correct: Way to go! You know that holding the camera still will prevent the photos from being blurry.
body.failed: You're almost there. Remember, hold the camera still to prevent photos from being blurry.
